#summary Java Bit Level I/O.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

A simple wrapper for bit level I/O with In|!OutputStream.


= Details =
You can read/write variable length of bits from/to !InputStream and !OutputStream.

== Values ==
|| *type* || *bit range* || *notes* ||
|| boolean || 1 || 1 for true; 0 for false ||
|| unsigned int || 1 ~ 31 || ||
|| int || 2 ~ 32 || ||
|| unsigned long || 1 ~ 63 || ||
|| long || 2 ~ 64 || ||
|| bytes || 31 + 8N || N: number of bytes ||
|| BYTES || 1 + 31 + 8N || N: number of bytes ||
|| ASCII || 1 + 31 + 7N || N: number of characters ||
|| STRING || 1 + 31 + 8N || N: number of bytes ||
|| UTF || 16 + 8N || !DataInput#readUTF<br/>!DataOutput#writeUTF||
